original_text: For you may be giving thanks well enough, but the other person is not being built up.
korean_text: 너는 감사를 잘하였으나 그러나 다른 사람은 덕 세움을 받지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: For you may be giving thanks well enough
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 감사를 충분히 잘하고 있을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: but the other person is not being built up.
